sp_instance.title: Welcome to the Legal Portal
sp_instance.widget_parameters:
{ "html": { "value": "

Welcome to the MyService Legal Portal

Initially you can use this site to:-

  • Request authorisation to hand carry & use your BAE Systems issue Smartphone, Tablet or Laptop overseas.
  • Request an MoD F680 approval
  • Request an Authorisation to Transmit Technology (AtTT) to an overseas businesses.

Should you require any assistance or support, please either contact your Programme Export Control Officer or e-mail import.exportdept@baesystems.com.

", "displayValue": "

Welcome to the MyService Legal Portal

Initially you can use this site to:-

  • Request authorisation to hand carry & use your BAE Systems issue Smartphone, Tablet or Laptop overseas.
  • Request an MoD F680 approval
  • Request an Authorisation to Transmit Technology (AtTT) to an overseas businesses.

Should you require any assistance or support, please either contact your Programme Export Control Officer or e-mail import.exportdept@baesystems.com.
